name: Visit the Hot Springs in Kakariko and Death Mountain
Turn the Lakebed Temple Stairs 5 Times
Buy all Items in Death Mountain Goron Shop
Talk to the Postman in 2 Different Locations (not via mail delivery)
Examine all Sky Book Character Locations
Get Lakebed Temple Map, Compass & Boss Key
Clear 10 Floors of Cave of Ordeals
Kill all Temple of Time Poes
Get a Flower from Castle Town Market
Kill all City in the Sky Poes
Look Around in Hena's House (get all dialogues)
